tools.name: litellm_hello_world
tools.content:
# The installer requires curl (and certificates) to download the release archive
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends curl ca-certificates

curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/0.4.27/install.sh | sh > /dev/null 2>&1
export PATH="/root/.cargo/bin/:$PATH"

uv add litellm==1.49.4 typer==0.12.5 > /dev/null 2>&1

uv run python /tmp/main.py "{{ .name }}"

args.name: name
args.description: Input param for arg: name, type: string
